```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ceRNAnetsim)
```

```{r}
data("midsamp")
midsamp

edit(minsamp)-> aaaa
rm(aaaa)
```

```{r}
midsamp%>%
priming_graph(Gene_expression, miRNA_expression)
    update_how("Gene1", 0)%>%
  simulate(cycle = 10)%>%
    activate(edges)%>%
  as_tibble()%>%
  select(comp_count_current)
  

```

```{r}
tibble(genename=c("geneX","geneY"), mirname=c("let7","let7"), genexp=c(1000,2000), mirexp=c(100,100))%>%
priming_graph(genexp, mirexp)

minsamp%>%
  priming_graph(Competing_expression, miRNA_expression)%>% update_nodes(once=TRUE)%>%
  update_how("Gene1", 3)
```
